22
23TString Define(const TStructure &structure,
24 bool useHLSLRowMajorPacking,
25 bool useStd140Packing,
26 bool forcePadding,
27 Std140PaddingHelper *padHelper)
28{
29 const TFieldList &fields = structure.fields();
30 const bool isNameless = (structure.symbolType() == SymbolType::Empty);
31 const TString &structName = QualifiedStructNameString(structure, useHLSLRowMajorPacking,
32 useStd140Packing, forcePadding);
33 const TString declareString = (isNameless ? "struct" : "struct " + structName);
34
35 TString string;
36 string += declareString +
37 "\n"
38 "{\n";
39
40 size_t memberSize = fields.size();
41 for (const TField *field : fields)
42 {
43 memberSize--;
44 const TType &fieldType = *field->type();
45 if (!IsSampler(fieldType.getBasicType()))
46 {
47 const TStructure *fieldStruct = fieldType.getStruct();
48 const TString &fieldTypeString =
49 fieldStruct ? QualifiedStructNameString(*fieldStruct, useHLSLRowMajorPacking,
50 useStd140Packing, false)
51 : TypeString(fieldType);
52
53 if (padHelper)
54 {
55 string += padHelper->prePaddingString(
56 fieldType, (memberSize != fields.size() - 1) && forcePadding);
57 }
58
59 string += " " + fieldTypeString + " " + DecorateField(field->name(), structure) +
60 ArrayString(fieldType).data() + ";\n";
61
62 if (padHelper)
63 {
64 string += padHelper->postPaddingString(fieldType, useHLSLRowMajorPacking,
65 memberSize == 0 && forcePadding);
66 }
67 }
68 }
69
70 // Nameless structs do not finish with a semicolon and newline, to leave room for an instance
71 // variable
72 string += (isNameless ? "} " : "};\n");
73
74 return string;
75}
76
77TString WriteParameterList(const std::vector<TType> &parameters)
78{
79 TString parameterList;
80 for (size_t parameter = 0u; parameter < parameters.size(); parameter++)
81 {
82 const TType &paramType = parameters[parameter];
83
84 parameterList +=
85 TypeString(paramType) + " x" + str(parameter) + ArrayString(paramType).data();
86
87 if (parameter < parameters.size() - 1u)
88 {
89 parameterList += ", ";
90 }
91 }
92 return parameterList;
93}
94
95} // anonymous namespace
96
97Std140PaddingHelper::Std140PaddingHelper(const std::map<TString, int> &structElementIndexes,
98 unsigned *uniqueCounter)
99 : mPaddingCounter(uniqueCounter), mElementIndex(0), mStructElementIndexes(&structElementIndexes)
100{}
101
102Std140PaddingHelper::Std140PaddingHelper(const Std140PaddingHelper &other)
103 : mPaddingCounter(other.mPaddingCounter),
104 mElementIndex(other.mElementIndex),
105 mStructElementIndexes(other.mStructElementIndexes)
106{}
107
108Std140PaddingHelper &Std140PaddingHelper::operator=(const Std140PaddingHelper &other)
109{
110 mPaddingCounter = other.mPaddingCounter;
111 mElementIndex = other.mElementIndex;
112 mStructElementIndexes = other.mStructElementIndexes;
113 return *this;
114}
115
116TString Std140PaddingHelper::next()
117{
118 unsigned value = (*mPaddingCounter)++;
119 return str(value);
120}
121
122int Std140PaddingHelper::prePadding(const TType &type, bool forcePadding)
123{
124 if (type.getBasicType() == EbtStruct || type.isMatrix() || type.isArray())
125 {
126 // no padding needed, HLSL will align the field to a new register
127 mElementIndex = 0;
128 return 0;
129 }
130
131 const GLenum glType = GLVariableType(type);
132 const int numComponents = gl::VariableComponentCount(glType);
133
134 if (numComponents >= 4)
135 {
136 // no padding needed, HLSL will align the field to a new register
137 mElementIndex = 0;
138 return 0;
139 }
140
141 if (mElementIndex + numComponents > 4)
142 {
143 if (forcePadding)
144 {
145 // If this structure will be used as HLSL StructuredBuffer member's type, we should add
146 // padding between the structure's members to follow the std140 rules manually.
147 const int forcePaddingCount = 4 - mElementIndex;
148 mElementIndex = numComponents;
149 return forcePaddingCount;
150 }
151 else
152 {
153 // no padding needed, HLSL will align the field to a new register
154 mElementIndex = numComponents;
155 return 0;
156 }
157 }
158
159 const int alignment = numComponents == 3 ? 4 : numComponents;
160 const int paddingOffset = (mElementIndex % alignment);
161 const int paddingCount = (paddingOffset != 0 ? (alignment - paddingOffset) : 0);
162
163 mElementIndex += paddingCount;
164 mElementIndex += numComponents;
165 mElementIndex %= 4;
166
167 return paddingCount;
168}
169
170TString Std140PaddingHelper::prePaddingString(const TType &type, bool forcePadding)
171{
172 int paddingCount = prePadding(type, forcePadding);
173
174 TString padding;
175
176 for (int paddingIndex = 0; paddingIndex < paddingCount; paddingIndex++)
177 {
178 padding += " float pad_" + next() + ";\n";
179 }
180
181 return padding;
182}
183
184TString Std140PaddingHelper::postPaddingString(const TType &type,
185 bool useHLSLRowMajorPacking,
186 bool forcePadding)
187{
188 if (!type.isMatrix() && !type.isArray() && type.getBasicType() != EbtStruct)
189 {
190 if (forcePadding)
191 {
192 // If this structure will be used as HLSL StructuredBuffer member's type, we
193 // should force to pad the end of the structure to follow the std140 rules.
194 TString forcePaddingStr;
195 const int paddingOffset = mElementIndex % 4;
196 const int paddingCount = paddingOffset != 0 ? (4 - paddingOffset) : 0;
197 for (int paddingIndex = 0; paddingIndex < paddingCount; paddingIndex++)
198 {
199 forcePaddingStr += " float pad_" + next() + ";\n";
200 }
201 return forcePaddingStr;
202 }
203 return "";
204 }
205
206 int numComponents = 0;
207 const TStructure *structure = type.getStruct();
208
209 if (type.isMatrix())
210 {
211 // This method can also be called from structureString, which does not use layout
212 // qualifiers.
213 // Thus, use the method parameter for determining the matrix packing.
214 //
215 // Note HLSL row major packing corresponds to GL API column-major, and vice-versa, since we
216 // wish to always transpose GL matrices to play well with HLSL's matrix array indexing.
217 //
218 const bool isRowMajorMatrix = !useHLSLRowMajorPacking;
219 const GLenum glType = GLVariableType(type);
220 numComponents = gl::MatrixComponentCount(glType, isRowMajorMatrix);
221 }
222 else if (structure)
223 {
224 const TString &structName =
225 QualifiedStructNameString(*structure, useHLSLRowMajorPacking, true, false);
226 numComponents = mStructElementIndexes->find(structName)->second;
227
228 if (numComponents == 0)
229 {
230 return "";
231 }
232 }
233 else
234 {
235 const GLenum glType = GLVariableType(type);
236 numComponents = gl::VariableComponentCount(glType);
237 }
238
239 TString padding;
240 for (int paddingOffset = numComponents; paddingOffset < 4; paddingOffset++)
241 {
242 padding += " float pad_" + next() + ";\n";
243 }
244 return padding;
245}
246
247StructureHLSL::StructureHLSL() : mUniquePaddingCounter(0) {}
248
249Std140PaddingHelper StructureHLSL::getPaddingHelper()
250{
251 return Std140PaddingHelper(mStd140StructElementIndexes, &mUniquePaddingCounter);
252}
253
254TString StructureHLSL::defineQualified(const TStructure &structure,
255 bool useHLSLRowMajorPacking,
256 bool useStd140Packing,
257 bool forcePadding)
258{
259 if (useStd140Packing)
260 {
261 Std140PaddingHelper padHelper = getPaddingHelper();
262 return Define(structure, useHLSLRowMajorPacking, useStd140Packing, forcePadding,
263 &padHelper);
264 }
265 else
266 {
267 return Define(structure, useHLSLRowMajorPacking, useStd140Packing, false, nullptr);
268 }
269}
270
271TString StructureHLSL::defineNameless(const TStructure &structure)
272{
273 return Define(structure, false, false, false, nullptr);
274}
275
276StructureHLSL::DefinedStructs::iterator StructureHLSL::defineVariants(const TStructure &structure,
277 const TString &name)
278{
279 ASSERT(mDefinedStructs.find(name) == mDefinedStructs.end());
280
281 for (const TField *field : structure.fields())
282 {
283 const TType *fieldType = field->type();
284 if (fieldType->getBasicType() == EbtStruct)
285 {
286 ensureStructDefined(*fieldType->getStruct());
287 }
288 }
289
290 DefinedStructs::iterator addedStruct =
291 mDefinedStructs.insert(std::make_pair(name, new TStructProperties())).first;
292 // Add element index
293 storeStd140ElementIndex(structure, false);
294 storeStd140ElementIndex(structure, true);
295
296 const TString &structString = defineQualified(structure, false, false, false);
297
298 ASSERT(std::find(mStructDeclarations.begin(), mStructDeclarations.end(), structString) ==
299 mStructDeclarations.end());
300 // Add row-major packed struct for interface blocks
301 TString rowMajorString = "#pragma pack_matrix(row_major)\n" +
302 defineQualified(structure, true, false, false) +
303 "#pragma pack_matrix(column_major)\n";
304
305 TString std140String = defineQualified(structure, false, true, false);
306 TString std140RowMajorString = "#pragma pack_matrix(row_major)\n" +
307 defineQualified(structure, true, true, false) +
308 "#pragma pack_matrix(column_major)\n";
309
310 // Must force to pad the structure's elements for StructuredBuffer's element type, if qualifier
311 // of structure is std140.
312 TString std140ForcePaddingString = defineQualified(structure, false, true, true);
313 TString std140RowMajorForcePaddingString = "#pragma pack_matrix(row_major)\n" +
314 defineQualified(structure, true, true, true) +
315 "#pragma pack_matrix(column_major)\n";
316
317 mStructDeclarations.push_back(structString);
318 mStructDeclarations.push_back(rowMajorString);
319 mStructDeclarations.push_back(std140String);
320 mStructDeclarations.push_back(std140RowMajorString);
321 mStructDeclarations.push_back(std140ForcePaddingString);
322 mStructDeclarations.push_back(std140RowMajorForcePaddingString);
323 return addedStruct;
324}
325
326void StructureHLSL::ensureStructDefined(const TStructure &structure)
327{
328 const TString name = StructNameString(structure);
329 if (name == "")
330 {
331 return; // Nameless structures are not defined
332 }
333 if (mDefinedStructs.find(name) == mDefinedStructs.end())
334 {
335 defineVariants(structure, name);
336 }
337}
338
339TString StructureHLSL::addStructConstructor(const TStructure &structure)
340{
341 const TString name = StructNameString(structure);
342
343 if (name == "")
344 {
345 return TString(); // Nameless structures don't have constructors
346 }
347
348 auto definedStruct = mDefinedStructs.find(name);
349 if (definedStruct == mDefinedStructs.end())
350 {
351 definedStruct = defineVariants(structure, name);
352 }
353 const TString constructorFunctionName = TString(name) + "_ctor";
354 TString *constructor = &definedStruct->second->constructor;
355 if (!constructor->empty())
356 {
357 return constructorFunctionName; // Already added
358 }
359 *constructor += name + " " + constructorFunctionName + "(";
360
361 std::vector<TType> ctorParameters;
362 const TFieldList &fields = structure.fields();
363 for (const TField *field : fields)
364 {
365 const TType *fieldType = field->type();
366 if (!IsSampler(fieldType->getBasicType()))
367 {
368 ctorParameters.push_back(*fieldType);
369 }
370 }
371 // Structs that have sampler members should not have constructor calls, and otherwise structs
372 // are guaranteed to be non-empty by the grammar. Structs can't contain empty declarations
373 // either.
374 ASSERT(!ctorParameters.empty());
375
376 *constructor += WriteParameterList(ctorParameters);
377
378 *constructor +=
379 ")\n"
380 "{\n"
381 " " +
382 name + " structure = { ";
383
384 for (size_t parameterIndex = 0u; parameterIndex < ctorParameters.size(); ++parameterIndex)
385 {
386 *constructor += "x" + str(parameterIndex);
387 if (parameterIndex < ctorParameters.size() - 1u)
388 {
389 *constructor += ", ";
390 }
391 }
392 *constructor +=
393 "};\n"
394 " return structure;\n"
395 "}\n";
396
397 return constructorFunctionName;
398}
399
400TString StructureHLSL::addBuiltInConstructor(const TType &type, const TIntermSequence *parameters)
401{
402 ASSERT(!type.isArray());
403 ASSERT(type.getStruct() == nullptr);
404 ASSERT(parameters);
405
406 TType ctorType = type;
407 ctorType.setPrecision(EbpHigh);
408 ctorType.setQualifier(EvqTemporary);
409
410 const TString constructorFunctionName =
411 TString(type.getBuiltInTypeNameString()) + "_ctor" + DisambiguateFunctionName(parameters);
412 TString constructor = TypeString(ctorType) + " " + constructorFunctionName + "(";
413
414 std::vector<TType> ctorParameters;
415 for (auto parameter : *parameters)
416 {
417 const TType &paramType = parameter->getAsTyped()->getType();
418 ASSERT(!paramType.isArray());
419 ctorParameters.push_back(paramType);
420 }
421 constructor += WriteParameterList(ctorParameters);
422
423 constructor +=
424 ")\n"
425 "{\n"
426 " return " +
427 TypeString(ctorType) + "(";
428
429 if (ctorType.isMatrix() && ctorParameters.size() == 1)
430 {
431 int rows = ctorType.getRows();
432 int cols = ctorType.getCols();
433 const TType &parameter = ctorParameters[0];
434
435 if (parameter.isScalar())
436 {
437 for (int col = 0; col < cols; col++)
438 {
439 for (int row = 0; row < rows; row++)
440 {
441 constructor += TString((row == col) ? "x0" : "0.0");
442
443 if (row < rows - 1 || col < cols - 1)
444 {
445 constructor += ", ";
446 }
447 }
448 }
449 }
450 else if (parameter.isMatrix())
451 {
452 for (int col = 0; col < cols; col++)
453 {
454 for (int row = 0; row < rows; row++)
455 {
456 if (row < parameter.getRows() && col < parameter.getCols())
457 {
458 constructor += TString("x0") + "[" + str(col) + "][" + str(row) + "]";
459 }
460 else
461 {
462 constructor += TString((row == col) ? "1.0" : "0.0");
463 }
464
465 if (row < rows - 1 || col < cols - 1)
466 {
467 constructor += ", ";
468 }
469 }
470 }
471 }
472 else
473 {
474 ASSERT(rows == 2 && cols == 2 && parameter.isVector() &&
475 parameter.getNominalSize() == 4);
476
477 constructor += "x0";
478 }
479 }
480 else
481 {
482 size_t remainingComponents = ctorType.getObjectSize();
483 size_t parameterIndex = 0;
484
485 while (remainingComponents > 0)
486 {
487 const TType &parameter = ctorParameters[parameterIndex];
488 const size_t parameterSize = parameter.getObjectSize();
489 bool moreParameters = parameterIndex + 1 < ctorParameters.size();
490
491 constructor += "x" + str(parameterIndex);
492
493 if (parameter.isScalar())
494 {
495 remainingComponents -= parameter.getObjectSize();
496 }
497 else if (parameter.isVector())
498 {
499 if (remainingComponents == parameterSize || moreParameters)
500 {
501 ASSERT(parameterSize <= remainingComponents);
502 remainingComponents -= parameterSize;
503 }
504 else if (remainingComponents < static_cast<size_t>(parameter.getNominalSize()))
505 {
506 switch (remainingComponents)
507 {
508 case 1:
509 constructor += ".x";
510 break;
511 case 2:
512 constructor += ".xy";
513 break;
514 case 3:
515 constructor += ".xyz";
516 break;
517 case 4:
518 constructor += ".xyzw";
519 break;
520 default:
521 UNREACHABLE();
522 }
523
524 remainingComponents = 0;
525 }
526 else
527 UNREACHABLE();
528 }
529 else if (parameter.isMatrix())
530 {
531 int column = 0;
532 while (remainingComponents > 0 && column < parameter.getCols())
533 {
534 constructor += "[" + str(column) + "]";
535
536 if (remainingComponents < static_cast<size_t>(parameter.getRows()))
537 {
538 switch (remainingComponents)
539 {
540 case 1:
541 constructor += ".x";
542 break;
543 case 2:
544 constructor += ".xy";
545 break;
546 case 3:
547 constructor += ".xyz";
548 break;
549 default:
550 UNREACHABLE();
551 }
552
553 remainingComponents = 0;
554 }
555 else
556 {
557 remainingComponents -= parameter.getRows();
558
559 if (remainingComponents > 0)
560 {
561 constructor += ", x" + str(parameterIndex);
562 }
563 }
564
565 column++;
566 }
567 }
568 else
569 {
570 UNREACHABLE();
571 }
572
573 if (moreParameters)
574 {
575 parameterIndex++;
576 }
577
578 if (remainingComponents)
579 {
580 constructor += ", ";
581 }
582 }
583 }
584
585 constructor +=
586 ");\n"
587 "}\n";
588
589 mBuiltInConstructors.insert(constructor);
590
591 return constructorFunctionName;
592}
593
594std::string StructureHLSL::structsHeader() const
595{
596 TInfoSinkBase out;
597
598 for (auto &declaration : mStructDeclarations)
599 {
600 out << declaration;
601 }
602
603 for (auto &structure : mDefinedStructs)
604 {
605 out << structure.second->constructor;
606 }
607
608 for (auto &constructor : mBuiltInConstructors)
609 {
610 out << constructor;
611 }
612
613 return out.str();
614}
615
616void StructureHLSL::storeStd140ElementIndex(const TStructure &structure,
617 bool useHLSLRowMajorPacking)
618{
619 Std140PaddingHelper padHelper = getPaddingHelper();
620 const TFieldList &fields = structure.fields();
621
622 for (const TField *field : fields)
623 {
624 padHelper.prePadding(*field->type(), false);
625 }
626
627 // Add remaining element index to the global map, for use with nested structs in standard
628 // layouts
629 const TString &structName =
630 QualifiedStructNameString(structure, useHLSLRowMajorPacking, true, false);
631 mStd140StructElementIndexes[structName] = padHelper.elementIndex();
632}
